With over 5 years of experience in backend development and a passion for building scalable systems, I believe I would be a valuable addition to your team. My expertise in Go programming language, PostgreSQL, and microservices architecture aligns perfectly with your requirements. I am particularly excited about the opportunity to contribute to your innovative projects and help drive the company's technical excellence forward.

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the Senior Backend Developer position at Tech Innovations Ltd. Throughout my career, I have developed a strong foundation in backend technologies and have successfully delivered multiple high-impact projects.

I am particularly drawn to your company's commitment to innovation and technical excellence. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my skills and experience can contribute to your team's success.

Thank you for considering my application.

Best regards,
John Doe

item.description: Mengecek apakah suatu lowongan pekerjaan sudah disimpan oleh user atau belum. Berguna untuk menampilkan status save/unsave di UI.

Endpoints untuk mengelola saved jobs user. Fitur ini memungkinkan user untuk menyimpan lowongan pekerjaan yang menarik untuk dilihat kemudian. Semua endpoint memerlukan autentikasi user.

**Fitur utama:**
- Save job: Menyimpan lowongan ke daftar saved jobs
- Unsave job: Menghapus lowongan dari daftar saved jobs  
- Get saved jobs: Melihat semua lowongan yang disimpan dengan pagination
- Check status: Mengecek apakah job sudah disimpan atau belum

**Catatan:**
- User tidak bisa menyimpan job yang sama dua kali
- Saved jobs akan otomatis terhapus jika job vacancy dihapus
- Response includes informasi `has_applied` dan `is_saved` untuk setiap job
